alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:25PM EDT until July 10 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTY... At 723 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bedminster, or 19 miles south of Easton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. The public reported quarter size hail at 714 PM near East Rockhill Township. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Perkasie, Doylestown, Byram, Bedminster, Tinicum, New Hope, Dublin, Ivyland, Richboro, Ottsville, Pipersville, Gardenville, Lumberville, New Britain, Churchville, Newtown Grant, Village Shires and Warminster Heights. This includes Pennsylvania Turnpike near mile marker 348. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
